alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 19 at 1:33PM EST until January 21 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches through tonight with an additional 3 to 7 inches on Saturday. Northwest winds may gust as high as 30 mph near Lake Erie on Saturday. * WHERE...Northern Erie, Southern Erie and Crawford counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Widespread snow this afternoon will transition to lake effect snow this evening and continue through Saturday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission strongly encourage motorists to heed all travel restrictions and delay unnecessary travel. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
